name: Bugzilla tweaks bundle (myf)
description: Moves bug description to top left and metadata to the right, shrinks header and more
additional_info:
For Dusk* / Classic skins (visit /userprefs.cgi and search for `Bugzilla's general appearance (skin)`)

TOC:

  • header: minimize until hover
  • bug's status and meta info: move right (so description and comments moves to top)
  • comment textarea: move to bottom, under discussion (it could be already there in properly configured newer versions of Bugzilla)
  • saved searches: move to the top
  • search/filter list: autowidth
  • block links in table;
  • Visited links: distinguish
  • comment textarea: dimensions (necessary form moving from top)
  • comment textarea: differrent private state appearance
  • br, hr: hide (cleanup)
  • bug status: more contrast (emphasize)
  • comment boxes: increased line-height (readability)
